channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）的中间派联盟将于周六在里尔启动欧洲议会选举竞选活动，他正试图遏制极右翼势力的迅速崛起，并强调加大对乌克兰支持的重要性。
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron's centrist alliance was due on Saturday to launch off its campaign for European Parliament elections in Lille, as he tries to curb the rapid rise of the far right and hammer the importance of greater support for Ukraine.https://t.co/UYQWDZtszL pic.twitter.com/vO6ZNieHot

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 在尼日利亚，神圣的斋月将于下周初开始。尼日利亚正面临着一代人以来最严重的经济危机，食品通胀率高达 35%，使得这个非洲人口最多的穆斯林国家的许多人都在为购买食品而苦苦挣扎。更多信息
item.description:
The holy fasting month of Ramadan begins early next week in Nigeria, with the worst economic crisis in a generation and food inflation at 35%, leaving many in Africa's most populous Muslim country struggling to buy food.
Read more: https://t.co/hA22CrK1r4 pic.twitter.com/b6uTanleWr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 小熊维尼和小猪佩奇在一部超低成本恐怖片中大开杀戒，该片被拉兹奖（Razzie Awards）评为年度最差电影。恐怖片《小熊维尼》（Winnie-the-Pooh：血与蜜 "的制作成本不到 25 万美元。
item.description:
An ultra-low-budget horror film in which Winnie the Pooh and Piglet go on a brutal killing spree has been named the year's worst movie by the Razzie Awards. Slasher movie "Winnie-the-Pooh: Blood and Honey" made for less than $250,000.https://t.co/1si34I09EU

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 已故俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜亚周六发表了一条消息，称其父母感谢前来悼念儿子的俄罗斯民众。"感谢记忆！给人以希望的记忆！".➡️
item.description:
The parents of late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny thanked the crowds of Russians paying their respects to their son in a message published Saturday by his widow Yulia Navalnaya. "Thank you for the memory! The memory which gives hope!".
➡️ https://t.co/unMfUaFJK7 pic.twitter.com/p5ZyZ1yFVy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #根据当地媒体对国会议员、省议员和参议员的投票统计，扎尔达里以 411 票对反对党支持的候选人的 181 票当选。
item.description:
#UPDATE Zardari was voted in with 411 votes to 181 for the opposition-backed candidate, according to a local media tally of votes by national MPs, provincial MPs and senators. pic.twitter.com/KzDshm2D6F

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING 巴基斯坦阿西夫-阿里-扎尔达里第二次当选总统：当地媒体
item.description:
#BREAKING Pakistan's Asif Ali Zardari voted president for second time: local media pic.twitter.com/q9nkFEWOjq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 德国拜耳公司首席执行官比尔-安德森（Bill Anderson）表示，拜耳希望在四年内推出草甘膦（除草剂 "Roundup "的活性成分）的替代品。在此之前，许多法庭案件都与草甘膦涉嫌致癌有关。➡️
item.description:
Bayer hopes to introduce a substitute for glyphosate - the active ingredient in weed killer Roundup - within four years, Bill Anderson, chief executive of the German company said, after numerous court cases linked to its suspected cancerous effects.
➡️ https://t.co/imwT4mC7uX pic.twitter.com/ljZhX53Fj4

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 瑞典周六表示，它将恢复对联合国近东巴勒斯坦难民救济和工程处的援助，首批援助金额为2000万美元。与许多其他国家一样，在以色列指控十几名雇员参与了10月7日的哈马斯袭击事件后，瑞典暂停了对近东救济工程处的援助。
item.description:
Sweden said Saturday it was resuming aid to the UN agency for Palestinians with an initial disbursement of $20mn. Like many other countries, Sweden suspended aid to UNRWA after Israel accused a dozen of employees of involvement in the Oct 7 Hamas attack.https://t.co/Er9jDpGavQ pic.twitter.com/ylXYx3r56k

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 伊朗周六谴责美国科技巨头 Meta 删除伊朗最高领袖阿亚图拉-阿里-哈梅内伊的 Facebook 和 Instagram 账户的决定，称其 "侵犯了言论自由"。更多信息
item.description:
Iran on Saturday denounced US tech giant Meta's decision to remove the Facebook and Instagram accounts of its supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, calling it a "violation of freedom of expression".
Read more: https://t.co/EFOHV1tGGl pic.twitter.com/Lv3uJorzKO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 中国高层官员周六承认，中国需要采取更多措施来促进就业和稳定房地产市场。2023 年中期，中国青年失业率达到了前所未有的 21.3%，而房价则连续数月下跌。
item.description:
China needs to do more to boost employment and stabilise its property market, top officials acknowledged on Saturday. Youth unemployment hit an unprecedented 21.3% in mid-2023, while home prices have in turn fallen for months.https://t.co/R7hKwjGERS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 印度尼西亚交通部表示，将对两名飞行员在一次飞行中睡着后当地航空公司巴蒂克航空公司（Batik Air）展开调查。在1月25日从东南苏拉威西岛飞往雅加达的航班上，一名飞行员和一名副驾驶同时睡着了28分钟。
item.description:
Indonesia's transport ministry said it would open a probe into local airline Batik Air after two pilots fell asleep during a flight. A pilot and co-pilot were simultaneously asleep for 28 mins during a flight from South East Sulawesi to Jakarta on Jan 25.https://t.co/3QvLkSVWtq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安周六表示，安卡拉 "坚决支持 "巴勒斯坦激进组织哈马斯。自加沙战争开始以来，埃尔多安一直是以色列最激烈的批评者之一：
item.description:
Turkish President Recep Recep Tayyip Erdogan said on Saturday Ankara "firmly backs" Palestinian militant group Hamas. Erdogan has been one of the most virulent critics of Israel since the start of the war in Gaza.
Full story: https://t.co/LGdsM8dXhe pic.twitter.com/ixFJLhb85x

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 🇮🇪 爱尔兰在举行双重公投后开始计票，公投的目的是使宪法中有关家庭组成和妇女 "家庭生活 "的内容现代化。投票是反映天主教会影响力减弱的最新尝试。➡️
item.description:
🇮🇪 Ireland began counting votes after a  double referendum to modernise constitutional references to the make-up of a family and women's "life within the home". The votes are the latest attempt to reflect the waning influence of the Catholic Church.
➡️ https://t.co/4LVUaopUZb pic.twitter.com/Dz9RrKXp87

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 美国军方称，美国和盟军周六击落了伊朗支持的也门叛军向红海和亚丁湾发射的 15 架单向攻击无人机。这是自11月船只袭击开始以来规模最大的袭击之一。
item.description:
US and allied forces shot down 15 one-way attack drones fired by Iran-backed Yemeni rebels into the Red Sea and Gulf of Aden on Saturday, the US military said. It was one of the largest attacks since the start of the vessel strikings in November.https://t.co/5GQCY307mO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 伊朗媒体周六称，两名年轻女子在德黑兰跳舞庆祝波斯新年到来的视频发布后被捕。两名女子在塔杰里什广场附近摇摆臀部的视频在社交媒体上疯传。
item.description:
Two young women were arrested in Tehran after the publication of a video where they danced to celebrate the coming of the Persian New Year, Iranian media said Saturday. The clip of the two women hip shaking near Tajrish square went viral on social media.https://t.co/kqXnIIGGw7 pic.twitter.com/MnOyVCKt6K

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 印度尼西亚苏门答腊岛周六发生山洪暴发和山体滑坡，造成至少10人死亡，10人失踪：
item.description:
At least 10 people were killed and 10 others were missing after flash floods and a landslide on the Indonesian island of Sumatra, a local official said Saturday, forcing around 46,000 people to evacuate to temporary shelters.
Read more: https://t.co/3koMkOXEol pic.twitter.com/k64NKt65Xw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯周六称，一夜之间在其南部地区上空摧毁了47架乌克兰无人机，其中大部分位于与乌克兰接壤的罗斯托夫地区。罗斯托夫州南部是俄军计划在乌克兰开展军事行动的枢纽。➡️
item.description:
Russia said on Saturday it had destroyed 47 Ukrainian drones over its southern regions overnight, mostly in the Rostov area bordering Ukraine. The southern Rostov region is a hub for the Russian army to plan its military operations in Ukraine.
➡️ https://t.co/sTgPYNd8Vr pic.twitter.com/nByi1RTlI5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 🏏 拉维昌德兰-阿什温（Ravichandran Ashwin）在其具有里程碑意义的第 100 次测试中获得 5 张罚单，印度队在第五场比赛中以一局 64 分的优势击败英格兰队，在周六的系列赛中以 4-1 的比分锁定胜局。
item.description:
🏏 Ravichandran Ashwin took a five-wicket haul in his landmark 100th Test as India hammered England by an innings and 64 runs in the fifth match to seal the series 4-1 on Saturday.#AFPSportshttps://t.co/k0E52KzOuv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #最新消息：美国参议员周五深夜投票通过了一项4600亿美元的拨款方案，避免了政府部分停摆
item.description:
#UPDATE: US senators pushed a $460 billion funding package over the goal line Friday in a late-night vote, averting a partial government shut downhttps://t.co/4Iibt8zCDz pic.twitter.com/Y9NnZVMHVN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 鸟山明的《龙珠》以其划时代的艺术风格和无国籍的人物形象而备受喜爱，为日本享誉全球的漫画绘本行业树立了标准。鸟山明逝世时年仅 68 岁，他的去世引起了人们的强烈不满 ⬇️。
item.description:
Beloved for its genre-defining artwork and stateless characters, Akira Toriyama's "Dragon Ball" set the standard for Japan's globally renowned manga graphic novel industry.

The shock death of its creator, aged 68, prompted an outpouring of disbelief ⬇️https://t.co/8DaihUYlfI pic.twitter.com/usZg7wg8fC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 是西班牙文化不可分割的一部分，还是给员工造成不必要负担的传统？西班牙的加班时间--主要是在酒吧、商店和餐馆--引发了关于政府希望遏制 "不合理的 "过度行为的激烈辩论 ⬇️
item.description:
An integral part of Spanish culture or a tradition that needlessly burdens staff?

Spain's late working hours -- predominantly in bars, shops and restaurants -- have sparked heated debate over the government's wish to curb "unreasonable" excesses ⬇️https://t.co/FcLSZmMnWq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 本周末，米卡拉-希弗林（Mikaela Shiffrin）将在阿雷尔重返竞技滑雪赛场，这是她在遭遇严重撞击六周后，带着对男友亚历山大-阿莫德-基尔德（Aleksander Aamodt Kilde）的思念重返赛场，后者在比赛中 "生死未卜 "地摔倒在地，⬇️
item.description:
Mikaela Shiffrin returns to competitive skiing in Are this weekend, six weeks after a heavy crash and with her thoughts for boyfriend Aleksander Aamodt Kilde who survived a "life or death" fall while racing ⬇️https://t.co/ZM6MjLvW8z

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: ChatGPT 背后的公司 OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）将重返董事会。
item.description:
CEO Sam Altman will return to the board of OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, just months after a boardroom dustup that saw him fired and rehired https://t.co/HzN7bVjowX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 在全副武装的警察的监视下，囚犯们赤裸上身，被制服后一字排开。阿根廷最血腥的省份圣特菲省因毒品相关的帮派骚乱而发布了大量类似照片--这是对缉毒人员的警告⬇️。
item.description:
Shirtless and subdued, prisoners are lined up under the watch of heavily armed police.

Fed up with drug-related gang unrest, Argentina's bloodiest province Sante Fe has released a flurry of similar photos - a warning to narcos ⬇️https://t.co/IJjdN1Mpj8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 世界各地的人们周五通过抗议、示威和庆祝活动纪念国际妇女节 ⬇️
item.description:
People around the world marked International Women's Day Friday with protests, demonstrations and celebrations ⬇️https://t.co/eNSn2DOxQs pic.twitter.com/MsH1PERJ8m

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 周五，纽约的一个陪审团认定洪都拉斯前总统胡安-奥尔兰多-埃尔南德斯（Juan Orlando Hernandez）犯有向美国贩运数百吨可卡因的罪行，他在保护该地区一些最臭名昭著的贩毒集团的同时中饱私囊⬇️。
item.description:
A jury in New York on Friday found former Honduran president Juan Orlando Hernandez guilty of trafficking hundreds of tons of cocaine into the United States, enriching himself while protecting some of the region's most infamous drug cartels ⬇️https://t.co/1ATZIeH59m

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在几个月的激烈争论未能达成 2024 年预算方案后，美国参议员们争相在周五结束前就一项政府拨款方案进行投票，该方案将使几个面临关闭威胁的关键部门在本周末继续运作 ⬇️。
item.description:
US senators were scrambling to vote by the end of Friday on a government funding package that would keep open several key departments threatened with closure this weekend after months of bitter wrangling failed to produce a 2024 budget ⬇️https://t.co/qVNBGHE2dB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 英国小将奥利弗-比尔曼（Oliver Bearman）周五实现了自己的梦想，他首次代表法拉利车队参加一级方程式比赛，并在周六的沙特阿拉伯大奖赛中取得了令人印象深刻的第 11 名的好成绩 ⬇️。
item.description:
British teenager Oliver Bearman realised a dream on Friday when he made his competitive Formula One debut for Ferrari and qualified an impressive 11th for Saturday’s Saudi Arabian Grand Prix ⬇️https://t.co/BcMZvM5ajY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 随着本周末奥斯卡颁奖典礼红地毯筹备工作的开始，@AFP 目前的一些报道：◾ 奥本海默会胜过他们所有人吗？◾奥斯卡制片人分享晚会愿景 ◾提名名单
item.description:
As work begins on the red carpet ahead of this weekend's Academy Awards, some of @AFP's coverage so far:

◾ Will Oppenheimer outshine them all? https://t.co/yGi5CPuZbo

◾ Oscars producers share vision for gala https://t.co/MW1HA5JjGD

◾ The nominees https://t.co/ylTncEJPmM pic.twitter.com/A0hCtB2e6u

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 法新社记者 @saulloeb 拍摄的第一夫人吉尔-拜登在等待时的精彩照片，拜登总统在前往海军陆战队一号的途中花了 10 多分钟在绳索线上工作
item.description:
Great pic of First Lady Jill Biden waiting while President Biden spends over 10 minutes working the rope line en route to Marine One, by AFP’s @saulloeb pic.twitter.com/cBIsSOeCxn

— Danny Kemp (@dannyctkemp) March 8, 2024
